channel.title: Blog on Jelle Langedijk
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Jelle Langedijk

item.title: The website is up!
item.description: This is the first blog post on the website, made just before the website was deployed for the first time via GitHub pages! The website is still a “work in progress”, but came at a point where it is ready enough to share with the world. The website is not optimised yet for mobile screens, so don’t expect much there yet. The LinkedIn post related to the launch of the website can be found here.
